missing_pokemon: No Pokémon? Even Magikarp flop harder than you!
Where’s your squad? Team Aqua’s tides don’t wait for landlubbers!
low_level_cap: Your Pokémon couldn’t fill a puddle! Train in the open sea!
Weaklings! Come back when your team’s as deep as our ambition!
over_level_cap: Rebellious Pokémon? We’ll sink ’em to the abyss!
Control your beasts—or Team Aqua’s currents will!
battle_start: Drown in the tide of Aqua’s vision!
You’re just driftwood in our oceanic future!
battle_lost: Blubbering barnacles… The sea still rises!
This ain’t over! Captain Archie’ll flood you!
battle_won: Hah! Washed away like beach trash!
Team Aqua’s waves can’t be dammed!
on_cooldown: Scram. My Pokémon are charting new oceans.
Come back when you’re worth the salt.
is_busy: Can’t you see I’m storming continents?! Beat it!
Interrupting sacred tides? You’re shark bait!
done_looser: Enjoy your soggy win. The sea’s still ours!
Captain Archie’s tide’ll swallow you whole!
done_winner: Another loser for the briny depths. Good riddance.
Your corpse’ll feed the coral reefs.
done_generic: Enough. My Pokémon need a tidal nap.
Boring. Go play in a kiddie pool.
